com.codeferm.dbaccess

Class DbBeanMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codeferm.dbaccess.DbAccess
      • com.codeferm.dbaccess.DbBeanMapper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DbJdbcConn, DbJdbcDs

    public abstract class DbBeanMapper
extends DbAccess
    Abstract class adding simple bean mapping from database field names with underscore to camelCase bean properties.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    sgoldsmith
    See Also:
    DbAccess

    • Method Detail

      • fromCamelCase

        public final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> fromCamelCase(java.lang.reflect.Field[] fields)
        Convert bean property names from camelCase to underscore and return mapping. This way mapping only occurs one time for the entire ResultSet.
        Parameters:
        fields - Array containing bean field names
        Returns:
        Map of bean to database field names

      • getWriteMethods

        public final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.reflect.Method> getWriteMethods(java.lang.reflect.Field[] fields,
                                                                       java.lang.Class clazz)
        Get write method of each property and store in Map by name.
        Parameters:
        fields - Array containing bean field names
        clazz - Class of bean
        Returns:
        Map of bean write methods

      • createObjects

        public final <T> java.util.List<T> createObjects(java.sql.ResultSet resultSet,
                                  java.lang.Class clazz)
        Return list of beans mapped from ResultSet.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of beans
        Parameters:
        resultSet - ResultSet to process
        clazz - Class of bean
        Returns:
        List of <T> type beans
